(anka 3 satahana balanna) dala jathika nishpadanaya 1932 dita wada 1936 di 34% ihala mattamaka thibunu athara 1940 di yuddhaya aarambha wana wita 58% ka ihala mattame wiya. 1932 sita 1940 dakwa awarudu 8 ka samakami yugaye arthikaya 58% ka mattamaka wardhanaya wu athara 1940 sita 1945 dakwa awarudu pahaka yuddha kalayedi 56% dakwa wardhanaya wiya.

'pubudamu polonnaruwa' - disthrik sanwardhana wadasatahana - pramukha jalasampadana wyapruthi kriyathmaka kirima polonnaruwa disthrikkaye janathawage jiwana thaththwaya nanga situwima sandaha pirisidu paniya jalaya sapayime aramunin 'pubudamu polonnaruwa' - disthrik sanwardhana wadasatahana yatathe jala sampadana wyapruthi nawayak (09) kriyathmaka kirimatath, 2017 ha 2018 warsha wenuwen ee sandaha awashya rupiyal miliyana 6,464.36ka prathipadana wen karawa ganimatath nagara salasum ha jala sampadana amathya rawuf hakim mathithuma idiripath kala yojanawa amathya mandalaya wisin anumatha karana ladi.
